snippet: When asked last month about a potential spinoff of the pay-TV company, Liberty's chairman, John Malone said: "There are no plans on Starz at this time other than to grow it."
abstract: When asked last month about a potential spinoff of the pay-TV company, Liberty's chairman, John Malone said: "There are no plans on Starz at this time other than to grow it."

headline.main: Liberty's Spinoff of Starz Was Firmly Denied Only a Month Ago
